attributes.action: Make the wearing of a helmet compulsory for cyclists in public areas.
attributes.background: Statistics show that wearing a helmet greatly reduces the risk of death or serious injury in the event of a collision. In the same way that seatbelts are compulsory when driving a car, helmets should be compulsory when riding a bike.
